item.title: How I Passed the Goethe B2 German Exam With a Nearly Perfect Score
item.description: Last week on Monday I officially went from monoglot to… duo-glot? Bilingual sounds wrong. I didn’t grow up speaking two languages. Anyways, as a newly minted official Goethe Institute certified B2 German speaker, I wanted to stop and share how I prepped for the testâ€”and really, how I didn’t prep for the test.
